people.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
people.description: Franklin Delano Roosevelt , commonly known as FDR, was an American statesman and political leader who served as the 32nd President of the United States, from 1933 to 1945.

people.name: Brad Darrach
people.description: Brad Darrach  was a journalist and film critic.  A 1942 graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, he joined Time Inc.

people.name: Venetia Burney
people.description: Venetia Katharine Douglas Phair, n√©e Burney  was an English woman known for being the first person to suggest the name Pluto for the planet discovered by Clyde Tombaugh in 1930.

people.name: Jack Baldwin
people.description: Air Marshal Sir John Eustice Arthur Baldwin, KBE, CB, DSO, DL  was a senior officer in the Royal Air Force during the Second World War.

people.name: Charles Portal, 1st Viscount Portal of Hungerford
people.description: Marshal of the Royal Air Force Charles Frederick Algernon Portal, 1st Viscount Portal of Hungerford, KG, GCB, OM, DSO & Bar, MC, DL  was a senior Royal Air Force officer.

people.name: Bertine Sutton
people.description: Air Marshal Sir Bertine Entwisle Sutton, KBE, CB, DSO, MC  was a pilot in the Royal Flying Corps during the First World War and a senior officer in the Royal Air Force from the 1920s to the 1940s.
